THE_8BALL_DESCRIPTION: Auction site developed for a University project using Express and Node.js, where users can bid on items and sell their own. The site uses a local database to store user information and items for sale.
THE_8BALL_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Auction site developed for a University project using Express and Node.js.
MONOPOLY_DESCRIPTION: Terminal based Monopoly Bank Application developed for a University project using Java. The application allows users to play different games of Monopoly and keep track of their money.
MONOPOLY_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Terminal based Monopoly Bank Application developed for a University project using Java.
ABOUT_TEXT_4_1: In addition to my degree, I enjoy
ABOUT_TEXT_4_3: with new technologies to expand my knowledge.
